categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Suz-Anz was a female Jedi Master residing on Makeb with her Apprentice, Lyla, until 3638 BBY, when both were killed.

Suz-Anz appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel expansion to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Makeb. She is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means she was killed.
